title: Recruitment is broken. Can AI fix it? Hyring CEO thinks it can
description: At TechSparks 2025, Adithyan RK, Co-founder and CEO of Hyring, reveals how AI can cut bottlenecks, curb cheating, reduce bias, and give recruiters their time back.

title: Weekly Investment Analysts’ Ratings Changes for Arrive AI (ARAI)
description: Arrive AI (NASDAQ: ARAI) recently received a number of ratings updates from brokerages and research firms: 12/1/2025 – Arrive AI had its “sell (e)” rating reaffirmed by analysts at Weiss Ratings. 11/25/2025 – Arrive AI had its “sell (e)” rating reaffirmed by analysts at Weiss Ratings. 11/19/2025 – Arrive AI had its “sell (e)” rating [...]

title: Address maker secures ₹200-crore from AI growth to accelerate expansion
description: Real estate developer Address Maker has secured a ₹200-crore rolling capital framework from AI Growth, the holding company of Jiraaf. This strategic financing partnership will fuel Address Maker's expansion plans in Bengaluru and new markets like Mumbai, supporting land acquisition and project funding.

title: Indian enterprises all-set to take an AI leap as partners guide adoption
description: The AI revolution is transforming Indian businesses, emphasising the importance of strategic integration of AI into existing processes. Leaders from Salesforce, Deloitte, and Accenture highlight the need for partnerships and adapting mindsets to leverage AI's potential.
